name: Hopeless Run
description:
Captain Jane and her assistant Barry got themselves involves in quite a mess, and now the whole Federation is looking out for them.

Guess they’ll just have to keep running out until they reach the end of Space …

Try to dodge every single ennemy in this bullet hell game!

Give me your high scores, and most importantly your feedback so I can progress ;)

Credits:

Art: Swynfel

Music and sound effects: Cordero
